Median normalization of vectors of vectors.

Parameters:
start pointer to start of pointers of data ///
stop pointer to end of pointers of data ///
istop pointer to end of data in the first row ///
target target to normalize to ///
subSampleSize subsample the data when computing the median of the data row. ///
Remarks:
Like quantile norm, but with a target value.
